botinfo.description:
Hi, my name is ** {{clientName}} ** and I'm just another simple bot for the Discord of anime `Gochuumon wa Usagi Desu ka?`.

I was developed in the JavaScript using discord.js, I was created ** {{clientCreatedAt}} **, I joined `{{guildName}}` ** {{clientJoinedAt}} ** and I've been awake for ** {{ clientUptime}} **. 
 
I'm on {{clientGuildSize}} servers and I know {{clientUserSize}} bunnies!

calc.args-null: You must enter a valid value.

changeavatar.avatar: Okay, now I have a new avatar

changenickaname.args-null: I need you to put the new nickname you want me to set in the user.
changenickaname.success: nickname `{{member}}` has been successfully changed to {{nickname}}.

chat.args-null: put `on` to enable chat and `off` to disable chat.
chat.enable: chat enabled again, now everyone can talk again.
chat.disable: chat has been successfully disabled, now only superiors can talk here.

clear.error: I couldn't delete some messages once they are over **2 weeks**.
clear.args-null: you need to indicate how many messages you want me to delete
clear.limit: I can only delete up to `100` messages due to Discord limitations.

choose.args-null: You need to argue something to choose from.

congaparrot.args-null: You did not enter the desired amount.

dj: Well, the `DJ` permission is designed to prevent people from abusing music commands (such as skipping the music you are listening to or getting me out of the voice channel where you also find yourself). To get this permission, you must have permission to `Manage Server`, `Ban Members` or have the role named `DJ`, do that, good fun and enjoy my music commands, bye bye.

eval.error: I can't execute these codes because they are wrong, check https://discord.js.org to learn how.

fakemsg.args-null: You need to argue something for the fake user to talk about.

hug: {{author}} gave a very nice hug in {{member}}

vote.voteMsg:
Well, since you want to vote for me, just click [here](https://discordbots.org/bot/481282441294905344), if you voted, thanks, 
 
If you need help with my commands, type `{{prefix}} help` that I will send in your private.

sendDM: I sent in your private, take a look there.
mention-null: user not found, try to mention it next time.
dmClosed: Your direct messages are disabled, I could not send the information there.

dj-module.channel-null: you are not on any voice channels.
dj-module.another-channel: You need to be on the same voice channel as me.
